item.description:
Too cool and too relaxing! - Tubing down the Connecticut River

Farmington River Tubing will put you in their specially designed river tubes for a 2.5 mile ride down the wild and scenic Farmington River (about 1.5 hrs).

Float down through the picturesque calm sections, catch some sun, relax and get ready for some excitement! You will travel over three sets of rapids, and experience a thrill as you splash through the white water.

Picnic after, bring food to share - will arrange with coolers etc. as date gets closer.

Cost: $20.00/person
If we get 10 people we can do a group rate of $14.00

Please be sure to visit the website and read through the "Attention/Warning, Restrictions, and General Information" before you make your decision to join us.

The ride to Farmington is about 2 hours from Blackstone. Volunteers for carpool are greatly appreciated - please post in your RSVP.

We will leave at 10:00am with an estimated arrival of 12:00pm - so be sure to bring a snack as we will not have our picnic till after the tubing.

No charge for this event, but please donate gas money to those who are driving.
item.name: River Tubing!
